en.today: The Sagittarius moon aligns with Mercury early this morning, dear Aries, renewing your optimism in personal dreams and the people you love. However, a harsh connection with the nodes of fate suggests you may be looking over major details, so try not to make any important decisions without considering multiple angles. Your day unfolds peacefully as the universe seeks to lift you. Work on healing the soul through spiritual practices once evening emerges and Luna aspects Chiron. Bring structure to your nighttime routines to avoid issues with sleep later tonight when the moon and Saturn square off.

en.today: The energy will be both romantic and challenging this morning, dear Leo, as the Sagittarius moon aspects Mercury and the nodes of fate. Disagreements around money or commitment could put you and your sweetheart at odds, so remember to balance tension with affection. If you can't agree at the moment, focus on reconnecting emotionally and revisiting these topics at another time. The universe offers sparks of inspiration while Chiron stirs this evening. Embrace creative outlets and express what is in your heart to find healing. You could feel frustrated when Luna squares Saturn later tonight, especially if you sense that others are trying to push you around.

en.today: You could feel torn between finishing up your weekend chores, meeting with friends, or vegging out on the couch, dear Taurus, as the Sagittarius moon aspects Mercury and the nodes' fate. Put social obligations to the side, and consider what you need to feel refreshed and prepared for Monday's arrival. You'll crave time alone to release heavy emotions and hype yourself up once Chiron activates this evening. These vibes also work well with an intimate dinner with your closest companion. Avoid scrolling later tonight when Luna and Saturn square off, and focus on getting organized for the work week instead.

en.today: Look toward the future and build up the relationships that matter most, dear Gemini, as the Sagittarius moon aligns with Mercury and the nodes at early this morning. This cosmic climate emphasizes how the energy we give to others is returned, so be mindful to show compassion and respect where it is due. Try not to ache for the world's problems while Chiron stirs this evening, combating the blues by doing your part to uplift the communities that support you. Issues could arise within matters of the heart once Luna squares Saturn later tonight, mainly if opinions differ around long-term goals.
